long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn new words with no effort browsing the internet as usual. 

How it works:
- You simply read content in the language you know, while some of the words are translated into the language you are learning. As this word occurs in the context, you can easily understand its meaning as the context is written in your language. In addition, you can click on this word and get the original one. After you will meet this word a dozen times, you will remember it, even without pushing yourself to learn it!
